TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WorkflowRuntimeService extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: Represents the abstract base class from which the workflow runtime engine core services are derived.

span.span: Represents the abstract base class from which the workflow runtime engine core services are derived.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 工作流程執行階段引擎可以啟動和停止衍生自 類別的服務。Services that derive from the class can be started and stopped by the workflow runtime engine. 然而服務啟動或停止的順序是不確定的。服務可能需要其他服務的支援才可以在啟動時將自己本身正常初始化，相對的，服務也可能需要其他服務的支援才能在停止時正常關閉。The order in which the services are started or stopped, however, is indeterminate, and services may require the support of other services in order to properly initialize themselves when they are started, and, conversely, may require the to support of other services in order to properly shut down when they are stopped. 為了解決這個問題，工作流程執行階段引擎提供用於啟動和停止服務的兩階段機制。To address this problem, the workflow runtime engine provides two-phase mechanisms for starting and stopping services. 呼叫 時，工作流程執行階段引擎會為每個衍生自 類別的服務叫用 方法。When is called, the workflow runtime engine invokes the method for each of its services that derive from the class. 啟動所有這些服務後，工作流程執行階段引擎會引發 事件，從而為每個工作流程執行階段引擎服務叫用 方法。After all of these services have been started, the workflow runtime engine raises the event, which causes the method to be invoked for each workflow runtime engine service. 您的服務可以覆寫 方法以參與這個兩階段的過程。Your service can override the method to participate in this two phase process. 同樣地，當呼叫 時， 方法、 事件和 方法會提供這個兩階段機制。Similarly, when is called, the method, the event, and the method provide this two-phase mechanism. State 屬性包含 值，該值表示服務正在啟動或停止中，或是已完全啟動或停止。The State property contains a value that indicates whether the service is in the process of starting or stopping or is completely started or stopped. 衍生自 類別的服務在遇到造成未處理例外狀況的情況時，可以透過呼叫 來引發 事件。Services that derive from the class can raise the event when they encounter a condition that causes an unhandled exception by calling . 衍生自 類別、 類別、 類別和 類別的服務，最終都是衍生自 類別。Services derived from the class, the class, the class, and the class ultimately derives from the class.

summary.span: When overridden in a derived class, represents the method that will be called when the workflow runtime engine raises the event.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, represents the method that will be called when the workflow runtime engine raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作兩階段啟動機制，因此工作流程執行階段引擎服務可能在工作流程執行階段引擎已叫用所有它的工作流程執行階段引擎服務的 方法後，執行任何依賴其他服務的初始化。The class implements a two-phase starting mechanism so that workflow runtime engine services may perform any initialization that depends on other services after the workflow runtime engine has invoked the method for all of its workflow runtime engine services. 工作流程執行階段引擎呼叫所有它的工作流程執行階段引擎服務的 方法後，會引發 事件。After the workflow runtime engine has called the method of all of its workflow runtime engine services, it raises the event. 當 事件引發時，您可以覆寫 方法以提供您的服務所需的任何最後啟動功能。You can override the method to provide any final startup functionality required by your service when the event is raised. 由 事件訂閱和取消訂閱的機能是在內部處理。The mechanics of subscribing and unsubscribing from the event is handled internally. > [!NOTE] > 如果您的服務是在工作流程執行階段引擎已啟動後，經由呼叫 加入至工作流程執行階段引擎，則工作流程階段引擎將呼叫您的服務上的 。If your service is added to the workflow runtime engine by a call to after the workflow runtime engine has already been started, the workflow runtime engine will call on your service. 但在這種情況中，已經發生 事件，因此您的服務可能必須執行它通常由 方法內部的 中執行的任何初始化。However, in this situation, the event has already occurred, therefore, your service may have to perform any initialization that it would ordinarily perform in from inside the method. 您可以測試 以判斷工作流程執行階段引擎是否已啟動。You can test to determine whether the workflow runtime engine has been started. 在叫用 前是設定為 。 is set to before is invoked. 預設的 實作不會執行任何動作。The default implementation of performs no action.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnStopped() cil managed
abstract member OnStopped : unit -> unit override this.OnStopped : unit -> unit

summary.span: When overridden in a derived class, represents the method that will be called when the workflow runtime engine raises the event.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, represents the method that will be called when the workflow runtime engine raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作兩階段的停止機制，因此在工作流程執行階段引擎叫用執行階段引擎服務的 方法後，這些服務仍可視需要保留部分功能以支援其他服務的關閉。The class implements a two-phase stopping mechanism so that workflow runtime engine services may retain some functionality after their method is invoked by the workflow runtime engine in order that they may, if necessary, support the shutdown of other services. 工作流程執行階段引擎呼叫所有它的工作流程執行階段引擎服務的 方法後，會引發 事件。After the workflow runtime engine has called the method of all of its workflow runtime engine services, it raises the event. 當 事件引發時，您可以覆寫 方法以提供您的服務所需的任何最後關閉功能。You can override the method to provide any final shutdown functionality required by your service when the event is raised. 由 事件訂閱和取消訂閱的機能是在內部處理。The mechanics of subscribing and unsubscribing from the event is handled internally. > [!NOTE] > 如果在工作流程執行階段引擎執行時，呼叫 來從工作流程執行階段引擎中移除您的 ，工作流程執行階段引擎將呼叫您服務上的 。If your is removed from the workflow runtime engine by a call to while the workflow runtime engine is running, the workflow runtime engine will call on your service. 但在此情況中，將不會對您的服務呼叫 方法。However, in this situation, the method will not be called for your service. 因此，您的服務可能必須執行它通常由 方法內部的 中執行的最後關閉功能。Therefore, your service may have to perform any final shutdown that it would ordinarily perform in from inside the method. 您可以測試 以判斷工作流程執行階段引擎是否正在執行。You can test to determine whether the workflow runtime engine is running. 在叫用 前是設定為 。 is set to before is invoked. 預設的 實作不會執行任何動作。The default implementation of performs no action.

MemberSignature.Value: protected void RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent (Exception exception, Guid instanceId);
.method familyhidebysig instance void RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent(class System.Exception exception, valuetype System.Guid instanceId) cil managed

param.name: exception
param.span: The exception that could not be handled.

span.span: The exception that could not be handled.

param.name: instanceId
param.span: The of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.

span.span: The of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您的服務在執行期間遇到無法處理的例外狀況時，可以呼叫 以引發 事件。Your service can call to raise the event when it encounters an exception that it cannot handle during its execution. 您應該傳遞與未處理的例外狀況關聯的工作流程執行個體的 。You should pass the of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception. 例如，計時器服務可能傳遞與發生例外狀況的計時器關聯的 。For example, a timer service might pass the associated with the timer for which the exception occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property Runtime As WorkflowRuntime

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作流程執行階段引擎會在呼叫服務上的 之前設定這個屬性。The workflow runtime engine sets this property before it calls on the service.

summary.span: When overridden in a derived class, starts the service and changes the to .

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, starts the service and changes the to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫 時，工作流程執行階段引擎會在每個衍生自 類別的服務上叫用 。 is invoked by the workflow runtime engine on all of its services that derive from the class when is called. 工作流程執行階段引擎啟動後，藉由呼叫 將工作流程執行階段引擎服務加入至工作流程執行階段引擎時，也會叫用 。 is also invoked by the workflow runtime engine when a workflow runtime engine service is added to the workflow runtime engine by a call to after the workflow runtime engine has already started. 的預設實作會追蹤服務是否已啟動，並使用這項資訊擲回適當的例外狀況 (如果啟動服務時發現服務已在執行中)。The default implementation of tracks whether the service has been started and uses this information to throw the appropriate exception if the service is started while it is already running. 您可以透過覆寫此方法，提供由工作流程執行階段引擎啟動您的服務所需的額外方法。You can provide additional functionality necessary to have your service started by the workflow runtime engine by overriding this method. 但是，當工作流程執行階段引擎呼叫您服務上的 時，並不保證將會執行哪些服務 (如果有的話)。There is no guarantee about which, if any, services will be running when the workflow runtime engine calls on your service. 因此，在 方法中，您應該只執行任何不會依賴由其他服務提供功能的初始化。Therefore, in the method, you should only perform any initialization that does not depend on functionality provided by other services. 這包括由排程器服務等核心服務提供的功能。This includes functionality provided by core services such as the scheduler service. 工作流程執行階段引擎會在呼叫所有它的工作流程執行階段引擎服務的 方法後，引發 事件。The workflow runtime engine raises the event after it has called the method of all of its workflow runtime engine services. 如果您的服務在所有的工作流程執行階段引擎服務啟動後還需要其他的初始化，您可以覆寫 方法，以便在 事件引發時，執行這類初始化。If your service requires additional initialization after all of the workflow runtime engine services have been started, you can override the method in order to perform this initialization when the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 如果您的服務是在工作流程執行階段引擎已啟動後，經由呼叫 加入至工作流程執行階段引擎，則工作流程階段引擎將呼叫您的服務上的 。If your service is added to the workflow runtime engine by a call to after the workflow runtime engine has already been started, the workflow runtime engine will call on your service. 但在這種情況中，已經發生 事件，因此您的服務可能必須執行它通常由 方法內部的 中執行的任何初始化。However, in this situation, the event has already occurred, therefore, your service may have to perform any initialization that it would ordinarily perform in from inside the method. 您可以測試 以判斷工作流程執行階段引擎是否已啟動。You can test to determine whether the workflow runtime engine has been started. 應該只能由工作流程執行階段引擎呼叫。 should only be called by the workflow runtime engine. ## Examples 下列範例將示範呼叫衍生自 之物件上的 Start 方法 (TerminationTrackingService)。The following example demonstrates calling the Start method on an object derived from , TerminationTrackingService. 這個範例來自＜暫止追蹤服務 SDK＞範例。This example is from the Termination Tracking Service SDK sample. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[終止追蹤服務範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439)。For more information, see [Termination Tracking Service Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29b7c0d7-cece-4bb9-96d0-c5b6c6e14439). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#112](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#112)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#112](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#112)]

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property State As WorkflowRuntimeServiceState

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作用於啟動和停止工作流程執行階段引擎服務的兩階段機制。The class implements two-phase mechanisms for both starting and stopping a workflow runtime engine service. 啟動機制的第一個階段會從工作流程執行階段引擎呼叫服務的 方法實作時開始。The first phase of the start mechanism begins when the workflow runtime engine calls the implementation of the method for the service. 此方法應呼叫 的基底實作，將 設定為 。This method should call the base implementation of , which sets to . 第二個階段發生在工作流程執行階段引擎在引發 事件時，並啟動所有工作流程執行階段引擎服務後。The second phase occurs after the workflow runtime engine starts all of its workflow runtime engine services when it raises the event. 在內部管理此事件的訂閱，而且其處理常式會將 設定為 。The internally manages a subscription to this event and its handler will set to . 停止工作流程執行階段引擎服務的兩階段機制會在工作流程執行階段引擎呼叫服務的 方法實作時開始。The two-phase mechanism for stopping a workflow runtime engine service begins when the workflow runtime engine calls the implementation of the method for the service. 此方法應呼叫 的基底實作，將 設定為 。This method should call the base implementation of , which sets to . 在停止所有工作流程執行階段引擎服務後，工作流程執行階段引擎會引發 事件。After it has stopped all of its workflow runtime engine services, the workflow runtime engine raises the event. 在內部管理此事件的訂閱，而且其處理常式會將 設定為 。The internally manages a subscription to this event and its handler will set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫 時，工作流程執行階段引擎會在每個衍生自 類別的服務上叫用 。 is invoked by the workflow runtime engine on all of its services that derive from the class when is called. 呼叫 從工作流程執行階段引擎移除工作流程執行階段引擎服務時，工作流程執行階段引擎也會叫用 。 is also invoked by the workflow runtime engine when a workflow runtime engine service is removed from the workflow runtime engine by a call to . 的預設實作會追蹤服務是否已啟動，並使用這項資訊擲回適當的例外狀況 (如果服務在它啟動之前已停止)。The default implementation of tracks whether the service has been started and uses this information to throw the appropriate exception if the service is stopped before it is started. 您可以透過覆寫此方法，提供由工作流程執行階段引擎停止您的服務所需的額外方法，You can provide additional functionality necessary to have your service stopped by the workflow runtime engine by overriding this method. 但是，在服務上呼叫 時，並不保證將會停止哪些服務或哪些服務仍在執行中 (如果有的話)。There is no guarantee about which, if any, services will be stopped or running when is called on your service. 工作流程執行階段引擎會在呼叫所有它的工作流程執行階段引擎服務的 方法後，引發 事件。The workflow runtime engine raises the event after it has called the method of all of its workflow runtime engine services. 您的服務可能需要保留一些剩餘功能以支援其他服務，直到工作流程執行階段引擎叫用所有工作流程執行階段引擎的停止方法為止。Your service may need to retain some residual functionality to support other services until all the workflow runtime engine services have had their stop methods invoked by the workflow runtime engine. 如果您的服務必須保留這類功能，您可以覆寫 方法，以便在 事件引發時，執行完成停止服務所需的任何額外動作。If your service must retain such functionality, you can override the method to perform any additional action required to finish stopping your service when the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 如果在工作流程執行階段引擎執行時，呼叫 來從工作流程執行階段引擎中移除您的 ，工作流程執行階段引擎將呼叫您服務上的 。If your is removed from the workflow runtime engine by a call to while the workflow runtime engine is running, the workflow runtime engine will call on your service. 但在此情況中，將不會對您的服務呼叫 方法。However, in this situation, the method will not be called for your service. 因此，您的服務可能必須執行它通常由 方法內部的 中執行的額外關閉功能。Therefore, your service may have to perform any additional shutdown functionality that it would ordinarily perform in from inside the method. 您可以測試 以判斷工作流程執行階段引擎是否正在執行。You can test to determine whether the workflow runtime engine is running. 應該只能由工作流程執行階段引擎呼叫。 should only be called by the workflow runtime engine.
